co.cask.coopr.provisioner.mock

Class MockProvisionerWorkerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractScheduledService
      • co.cask.coopr.provisioner.mock.MockProvisionerWorkerService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service

    public class MockProvisionerWorkerService
extends com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractScheduledService
    Mock service that will spin up and shut down mock workers for tenants.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MockProvisionerWorkerService

        public MockProvisionerWorkerService(String provisionerId,
                            String serverUrl,
                            int capacity,
                            long taskMs,
                            long msBetweenTasks,
                            int failureRate)
        Create a worker service for the given provisioner id that talks to the given server url for tasks and has the given capacity. Each worker created will wait for the given amount of time between taking tasks and will finish a taken task after the given amount of time.
        Parameters:
        provisionerId - Id of the provisioner
        serverUrl - URL of the server workers will communicate with
        capacity - Maximum number of workers that can be running at any given time
        taskMs - Time that workers should wait before finishing a task
        msBetweenTasks - Time workers should wait between finishing a task and taking another task
        failureRate - Percentage of the time that a worker should decide to fail the task it was given. 0 to 100.
